elements.title: Great Divine Temple (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that the Great Divine Temple of Caodaism holds the cosmos ball (pictured), which represents the Jade Emperor's universe?

elements.title: curator aedium sacrarum et operum locorumque publicorum (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that the curator aedium sacrarum et operum locorumque publicorum was responsible for the upkeep of public works and buildings in ancient Rome?

elements.title: a statue in New Zealand (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that British intervention reversed the lacquering of a statue in New Zealand?

elements.title: Harry Dunn (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Harry Dunn guarded a stairwell and Nancy Pelosi's office during the January 6 United States Capitol attack?

elements.title: Kansas Business Hall of Fame (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that the Kansas Business Hall of Fame includes the founders of Pizza Hut and Russell Stover Candies?

elements.title: Logan Eggleston (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that three first-team All-Americans – Logan Eggleston, Zoe Fleck, and Asjia O'Neal – played on the University of Texas's NCAA volleyball championship team in 2022?

elements.title: WoodmenLife Tower (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that the WoodmenLife Tower hosts a livestream of a peregrine falcon nest on its 28th floor?

elements.title: Genghis Khan (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Genghis Khan was extremely charismatic and renowned for his generosity towards his followers?
